ModMetaData.name: [GMT] Metal Don't Burn
ModMetaData.author: Grizzlemethis, Neceros (Original), Mario (1.3)
ModMetaData.description:
Metals don't burn. So, stop it! Bad Rimworld.
Updated to work with 1.4
Steel, Plasteel, and Power Conduits don't burn. Silver, Gold, and Power Switches can only burn a little bit.
Also, steel is more durable because... it's steel, and that's how the original version intended it to be. It was also the same in the 1.3 release.
Grizzlemethis (Current Release), Neceros (Original Release), Mario (1.3 Release)
